name: Hyperion
description: The largest DEX on Aptos, combining concentrated liquidity market maker (CLMM) and orderbook functionality for a superior trading experience. Over $100M in TVL and $3B in trading volume.

name: LiquidSwap
description: The first DEX and AMM on Aptos, developed by Pontem Network. Supports token swaps, liquidity pools, yield farming, and cross-chain bridging.

name: TappExchange
description: A modular DEX with a hook-based architecture for customizable DeFi transactions. Integrates with various Aptos-native projects.

name: PancakeSwap
description: A leading multi-chain DEX, deployed on Aptos with $30M TVL and 59% market dominance on the ecosystem.

name: AUXExchange
description: Offers both AMM and a central limit order book (CLOB) with advanced trading options like limit orders and no fees on CLOB.

name: ThalaSwap
description: A DeFi HyperApp by Thala Labs, offering fast, secure trading with low fees, liquidity provision, yield farming, and lending through vaults.

name: CellanaFinance
description: The first Aptos DEX using the Ve(3,3) model, focusing on efficient liquidity provision and trading.

name: KanaLabs
description: An AMM-based DEX aggregator supporting cross-chain swaps across nine chains, with gasless swaps on Aptos via Paymaster and perpetual futures trading.

name: OKXDEX
description: A cross-chain DEX and bridge aggregator providing optimal swap rates using the X Routing algorithm.

name: Sushi
description: A multi-chain AMM DEX deployed across 30+ blockchains, including Aptos, with cross-chain functionality.

name: MerkleTrade
description: The first gamified omnichain perpetual DEX on Aptos, supporting up to 150x leverage across 50+ assets and staking for fee sharing.

name: AriesMarkets
description: A decentralized derivatives marketplace supporting spot and perpetual futures trading, lending, and borrowing.

name: Hippo
description: A trading aggregator helping users trade on a single interface with the best price across Aptos DEXs.

name: Panora Exchange
description: Panora Exchange is a DEX aggregator that provides users with access to a wide range of DeFi protocols on Aptos.
